string.name: error_ok
string.context: Label to show that an SDK operation has been complete successfully.

string.name: error_args
string.context: Label to show that an error of Invalid argument occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: error_access
string.context: Label to show that an error related with an denied access occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: error_noent
string.context: Label to show that an error related to a non-existent resource occurs during a Mega Chat operation.

string.name: error_exist
string.context: Label to show that an error related to an already existing resource occurs during a Mega Chat operation.

string.name: error_unknown
string.context: Label to show that an error related with an unknown error occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: error_toomany
string.context: Label to show that an error related to too many uses for a resource occurs during a Mega Chat operation.
